Vince Champion: a retired police officer, was temporarily stopped at the entrance of Universal Orlando Resort because he was wearing a T-shirt that said "Retired Police Officer" across the front.
Universal Orlando Resort has a policy th: 3. Despite being initially stopped, Champion was eventually allowed into the park while wearing the shirt.
